K12D0746_H0691:440a-3: kyi mtshan nyid rdzogs so;; ;;log 'dren zas su dri

K12D0746_H0691:440b-1: / rig sngags 'chang gis thog ma nyid du lag
K12D0746_H0691:440b-2: pa g-yon pas mar blangs la kham phor gyi nang

K12D0746_H0691:440b-24: gang su log 'dren rnams 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /

K12D0746_H0691:441a-1: log 'dren rnams kyi gnas bdag gis bshad lags so //
K12D0746_H0691:441a-3: log 'dren thams cad kyi srog mthar thug par bgyi ba'i las 'di yang bshad par 'tshal lo //
K12D0746_H0691:441a-4: bsgrubs pa'i rig sngags 'chang gis rdo rje khro bo'i
K12D0746_H0691:441a-5: dkyil 'khor skyang nul gyis byugs la k'a ra b'i
K12D0746_H0691:441a-6: ra'i shing gis me sbar la /
K12D0746_H0691:441a-7: k'a ra b'i ra'i me tog dag gi khrag gi
K12D0746_H0691:441a-8: nang du smyugs pa'i sreg blugs nyi shu rtsa gcig
K12D0746_H0691:441a-10: las de byas nas log 'dren thams cad bcing ngo zhes brjod na /
K12D0746_H0691:441a-12: log 'dren thams cad kyi mthar thug par gyis shig ces brjod na /
K12D0746_H0691:441a-14: bcings pa las bkrol na yang yid kyis bya'o //
K12D0746_H0691:441a-17: lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'i chus mgo bor blugs so //
K12D0746_H0691:441a-19: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pa'i seng ldeng gi phur bus bya'o //
K12D0746_H0691:441a-21: ha ha zhes bya ba dang /
K12D0746_H0691:441a-22: gu gul gyi bdug pas bya'o //
K12D0746_H0691:441a-23: dug las gso bar bya na /

K12D0746_H0691:441a-26: me tog dkar po la lan bdun bzlas brjod bya ba'am gu gul gyis bdug pas bya'o //
K12D0746_H0691:441b-1: mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te /
K12D0746_H0691:441b-2: rdo rje khro bo'i dkyil 'khor skyang nul gyis byugs
K12D0746_H0691:441b-3: nas pri yang ku'i shing gis me sbar te phub
K12D0746_H0691:441b-4: ma'i sbyin sreg lan brgya stong byas na zhag bdun
K12D0746_H0691:441b-7: dur khrod du song la rdo rje khro bo'i dkyil
K12D0746_H0691:441b-8: 'khor skyang nul gyis byugs pa'i dbus su sa las
K12D0746_H0691:441b-9: gzugs byas pa de'i khar dur khrod kyi shing gis
K12D0746_H0691:441b-10: me sbar te yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg lan brgya
K12D0746_H0691:441b-11: stong byas na / de ma thag tu dgra 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0746_H0691:441b-12: mar gyi do zhag brgyad la lag na rdo rje'i
K12D0746_H0691:441b-13: mdun du k'a ra b'i ra'i me tog dus gsum
K12D0746_H0691:441b-14: du brgya rtsa brgyad zhag bdun gyi bar du sbyin
K12D0746_H0691:441b-15: sreg byas na / khrag 'dzag par 'gyur ro //
K12D0746_H0691:441b-16: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa
K12D0746_H0691:441b-17: byas te k'a ra b'i ra'i me tog dkar po
K12D0746_H0691:441b-20: de nas skyes pa dang bud med dbang du bya bar 'dod na /
K12D0746_H0691:441b-21: ma da na las gzugs byas te ma da na'i
K12D0746_H0691:441b-22: tsher ma bdun gyis gnad rnams su btab la tsha
K12D0746_H0691:441b-23: ba gsum gyis snying gar bkang nas zangs kyi thur
K12D0746_H0691:441b-24: mas kyang rkang par btsugs la spyi bor phyung ste

K12D0746_H0691:441b-26: byed bzhin du seng ldeng gi me la sreg cing
K12D0746_H0691:441b-27: dus gcig kyang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas
K12D0746_H0691:442a-0: pa'i mjug @442a *// tu zhag gcig smyung ba byas
K12D0746_H0691:442a-1: la mchod pa rgya cher byas te lan brgya stong
K12D0746_H0691:442a-2: bzlas brjod byas na skyes pa dang /

K12D0746_H0691:442a-5: byas te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bil ba'i
K12D0746_H0691:442a-7: be kangka ta'i yam sreg shing yungs mar gyi nang

K12D0746_H0691:442a-9: / ti na ra re re thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0746_H0691:442a-10: yugs sa mo dbang du bya bar 'dod na /

K12D0746_H0691:442a-12: gyi bar du dus gsum du zar ma'i me tog
K12D0746_H0691:442a-13: brgya rtsa brgyad kyis lag na rdo rje la bsnun
K12D0746_H0691:442a-15: bu mo dbang du bya bar 'dod na /
K12D0746_H0691:442a-16: zhag gsum smyung ba byas te yar gyi ngo tshes
K12D0746_H0691:442a-17: bcu gsum la 'dod pa'i lha'i gzugs byas te 'di'i
K12D0746_H0691:442a-18: khar 'bras kyi sbyin sreg lan brgya stong byas na
K12D0746_H0691:442a-20: de nas mdzub mo sgrub par 'dod na /
K12D0746_H0691:442a-21: zhag gsum smyung ba byas te mar gyi ngo zhag
K12D0746_H0691:442a-22: bcu bzhi la dur khrod du song nas ba lang
K12D0746_H0691:442a-23: gi lci ba sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor
K12D0746_H0691:442a-25: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su mi'i thod pa ma chag
K12D0746_H0691:442a-26: ma nyams pa bzhag la tsandan dmar po'i dri chus
K12D0746_H0691:442a-27: gtor nas me tog dmar pos mchod la /
K12D0746_H0691:442a-28: de nas sgrub pa pos mdzub mos g-yab nas gang
K12D0746_H0691:442b-0: gi tshe thod pa 'gul @442b na; de'i tshe 'grub
K12D0746_H0691:442b-1: par 'gyur te / gang la mdzub mos bsdigs pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0746_H0691:442b-2: de nas gter dbyung bar 'dod na /

K12D0746_H0691:442b-4: rdo rje bal nag gi skud pas dkris te mar
K12D0746_H0691:442b-5: gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig smyung nga
K12D0746_H0691:442b-6: byas nas lag na rdo rje'i mdun du rdo rje
K12D0746_H0691:442b-7: de la lan brgya bzlas brjod byas na de'i tshe
K12D0746_H0691:442b-9: bsgrubs nas kyang gter gang na yod pa der bzhag
K12D0746_H0691:442b-10: pa rdo rje'i gter de blangs te 'byung bar 'gyur
K12D0746_H0691:442b-11: ro // de nas khro bo'i bzlas brjod byed bzhin du blang bar bya'o //
K12D0746_H0691:442b-14: de nas gshed byed bslang 'dod na /
K12D0746_H0691:442b-15: mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig smyung
K12D0746_H0691:442b-16: ba byas te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du dur
K12D0746_H0691:442b-17: khrod kyi shing gis me sbar la /
K12D0746_H0691:442b-18: ba lang gi shas sbyin sreg byas pa dang /

K12D0746_H0691:442b-20: gang la yid kyis bsam pa de bskyab par 'gyur ro //
K12D0746_H0691:442b-22: mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la dur khrod du
K12D0746_H0691:442b-23: song ste dur khrod kyi shing gis me sbar la
K12D0746_H0691:442b-24: sgren mor byung zhing skra bshig ste til dang bsres
K12D0746_H0691:442b-25: pa'i yungs kar gyis brgyad brgya sbyin sreg byas na
K12D0746_H0691:442b-27: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du padma'i sbyin sreg lan stong rtsa brgyad byas na /
K12D0746_H0691:443a-2: tshes grangs dang rgyu skar yang 'dam mi 'tshal /

K12D0746_H0691:443a-5: nim pa'i lo mas bsregs pa'i dur khrod kyi thal
K12D0746_H0691:443a-6: pa'i sbyin sreg lan brgya stong byas na mi mang
K12D0746_H0691:443a-9: sna ma'i me tog zho dang /
K12D0746_H0691:443a-11: mar gyi nang du smyugs pas lan brgyad brgya sbyin sreg byas na zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0746_H0691:443a-12: rdo rje khro bo bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi cho ga rdzogs so ////
K12D0746_H0691:443a-13: de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12D0746_H0691:443a-15: bdud rtsi thab sbyor gang gis log 'dren rnams kyi gsang ba'i gnas 'di dag bshad pa ni /
K12D0746_H0691:443a-18: pha rol gnon pa che lags so //
K12D0746_H0691:443a-19: bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la rig sngags
K12D0746_H0691:443a-20: rnams kyi dngos grub rnams kyi slad du gang gis
K12D0746_H0691:443a-22: gang gis mi 'grub pa yongs su zhu bar 'tshal lo //
K12D0746_H0691:443a-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi tshangs pa chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12D0746_H0691:443a-25: gang khyod sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhugs te /
K12D0746_H0691:443b-1: 'grub par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin gshegs pa la
K12D0746_H0691:443b-2: yongs su zhu bar byed pa legs so legs so
K12D0746_H0691:443b-4: khyod la rig sngags rnams kyi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ba dang /
K12D0746_H0691:443b-5: 'grub par mi 'gyur ba'i rgyu bshad par bya ste /
K12D0746_H0691:443b-6: 'jug par bya ba ma yin pa la 'jug pa gang yin pa dang /
K12D0746_H0691:443b-7: tshangs pa chen po 'joms pa dang /
K12D0746_H0691:443b-8: rig sngags la smod pa gang yin pa de la ni /
K12D0746_H0691:443b-10: mi bzad pa'i las byed pa'am /
K12D0746_H0691:443b-11: sdig pa'i ngang chul can nam /
K12D0746_H0691:443b-14: phur bus 'debs pa gang yin pa de la yang rig sngags 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0746_H0691:443b-16: byang chub kyi sems yongs su 'dzin pas ni /
K12D0746_H0691:443b-17: yid kyis kyang lha gzhan la phyag mi bya'o //
K12D0746_H0691:443b-22: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang byang chub
K12D0746_H0691:443b-23: kyi sems yongs su 'dzin pas lha gzhan la phyag
K12D0746_H0691:443b-24: byas na / byang chub kyi sems yongs su 'dzin
K12D0746_H0691:443b-25: pa med pa'i phyir de la lha de ma dad
K12D0746_H0691:443b-26: byas na / pa'i phyir te / de'i phyir des kyang rig sngags 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //

K12D0746_H0691:444a-0: padma dang khyu mchog la rkang pas reg par @444a *//
K12D0746_H0691:444a-1: byed pa de la yang rig sngags 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0746_H0691:444a-2: tshangs pa; gang gis rig sngags 'grub par mi 'gyur ba ngas mdor bstan pa yin no //
K12D0746_H0691:444a-3: de nas mi mdzed kyi bdag pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12D0746_H0691:444a-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de ltar sems can
K12D0746_H0691:444a-6: dag bde blag tu 'grub par bgyi ba'i gnas rnams
K12D0746_H0691:444a-7: ston pa thugs rje che ba lags so //
K12D0746_H0691:444a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12D0746_H0691:444a-10: gang dag la rig sngags kyi dngos grub 'grub par
K12D0746_H0691:444a-11: 'gyur ba'i phyogs 'ga' tsam zhig khyod la bstan par
K12D0746_H0691:444a-14: dge 'dun la dga' ba gang yin pa dag dang /
K12D0746_H0691:444a-15: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa gang yin pa dag dang /
K12D0746_H0691:444a-17: ma la gus pa gang yin pa dang /
K12D0746_H0691:444a-18: rig sngags la mchod pa byed cing rig sngags la bkur sti byed pa gang yin pa dang /
K12D0746_H0691:444a-19: gsang sngags 'dzin par byed pa gang yin pa dang /
K12D0746_H0691:444a-20: 'byung po'i zas ngan pa dang til sbrus pa mi za ba dang /
K12D0746_H0691:444a-21: sems can thams cad la legs par lta ba gang yin pa de la ni /
K12D0746_H0691:444a-23: de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dga'
K12D0746_H0691:444a-24: zhing mgu la yid rangs te rab tu dga' nas
K12D0746_H0691:444a-25: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te bcom
K12D0746_H0691:444b-0: @444b ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12D0746_H0691:444b-2: bdag gis kyang lag na rdo rje'i tshe ga rgyas
K12D0746_H0691:444b-3: pa la gang gis rig sngags 'chang rnams srung ba'i
K12D0746_H0691:444b-7: gang khyod kyis sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir bsam pa shod cig shod cig /
K12D0746_H0691:444b-8: khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ngo //
K12D0746_H0691:444b-9: de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas lag na rdo rje la gsang sngags phul ba /

K12D0746_H0691:454b-5: dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya //
K12D0746_H0691:454b-6: las 'di dag kyang byas nas ni //
K12D0746_H0691:454b-7: dngos grub mchog 'gyur shes par bya //
K12D0746_H0691:454b-8: gang gis nyin mo yang rung ste zhag gcig smyung
K12D0746_H0691:454b-9: ba byas te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du dri
K12D0746_H0691:454b-11: bdug pa phul nas ba ser mo'i lci ba sa
K12D0746_H0691:454b-12: la ma lhung bas lha mo'i gzugs byas te lag
K12D0746_H0691:454b-13: pa g-yas par rdo rje thogs par bya /
K12D0746_H0691:454b-14: de'i 'og logs su sgrub pa po snyim pa zed cing 'dug par bya'o //
K12D0746_H0691:454b-15: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yid la bsam ste
K12D0746_H0691:454b-16: rig sngags brjod nas ci ste gzugs 'gul bar gyur
K12D0746_H0691:454b-17: na / de ma thag tu las 'grub cing /
K12D0746_H0691:454b-18: rig sngags kyang bde blag tu 'grub ste /
K12D0746_H0691:454b-19: bgegs thams cad kyang bsam pa tsam gyis 'jigs par 'gyur ro //
K12D0746_H0691:454b-20: yang na sgrub pa po'i lag tu rdo rje byin na //
K12D0746_H0691:454b-22: yang na bcom ldan 'das ma las 'od zer 'byung ste /
K12D0746_H0691:454b-23: 'od zer des phog par gyur na ni /
K12D0746_H0691:454b-24: rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur zhing glang po che'i stobs dang ldan la skra lcang lo 'khyil ba dang /
K12D0746_H0691:454b-25: nyi ma shar ba'i kha dog can du 'gyur zhing lag tu ral gri 'od bar 'gyur te /
K12D0746_H0691:454b-26: de thogs na rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyis mi
K12D0746_H0691:454b-27: sod la sgyu 'phrul dag kyang byed par 'gyur ro
K12D0746_H0691:455a-0: // gang gi tshe gnyid kyis log pa de na ral gri de dpag @455a *//
K12D0746_H0691:455a-1: tshad gcig tsam nas mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin du
K12D0746_H0691:455a-2: kun nas 'khor bar byed cing sad pa na shugs
K12D0746_H0691:455a-3: su 'gro ste / tshe lo khri bzhi stong thub
K12D0746_H0691:455a-4: cing nam 'chi ba de'i tshe bde ba can du
K12D0746_H0691:455a-6: las de byas te dngos grub kyi mchog sgrub na /
K12D0746_H0691:455a-7: cho ga rgyas pa'i dngos grub sbyin par byed de /
K12D0746_H0691:455a-8: mas bu la bya ba bzhin no //
K12D0746_H0691:455a-9: dngos grub bsgrub pa'i phyir dbang phyug chen po sgrub pa'i mdor bstan te /
K12D0746_H0691:455a-12: cho ga rgyas pa'i dngos grub mchog sgrub pa bstan pa ste /
K12D0746_H0691:455a-13: lag na rdo rje'i mdun du byang chub kyi shing
K12D0746_H0691:455a-14: gis me sbar la yungs mar dang sbyar bas lan
K12D0746_H0691:455a-15: brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na khru do'am khru gsum
K12D0746_H0691:455a-16: tsam du dud pa'i khri zhing 'byung ste /
K12D0746_H0691:455a-17: de nas rig sngags 'chang gis rig sngags kyi rigs 'grub pa dang /
K12D0746_H0691:455a-18: cho ga rgyas pa 'grub par shes par bya ste /
K12D0746_H0691:455a-19: de nas las brtsam par bya'o //
K12D0746_H0691:455a-20: yid la bsam ste phur bu gsum pas bshad pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang /
K12D0746_H0691:455a-21: lag na rdo rjes bshad pa bsgrub par bya'o //
K12D0746_H0691:455a-22: rna bar gshibs te bzlas brjod byas na /
K12D0746_H0691:455a-23: dngos grub kyi mchog ston par 'gyur te /
K12D0746_H0691:455a-24: nub kar lag na rdo rje la mchod pa byas
K12D0746_H0691:455a-25: la lag na rdo rje'i rna ba g-yas par rig
K12D0746_H0691:455a-26: sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas ci
K12D0746_H0691:455a-27: ste rmi lam du bram ze mthong na /
K12D0746_H0691:455b-0: de la blta zhing las bsgrub par @455b bya'o; ;ri mo'i gzugs gang gis mthong ba des ni /
K12D0746_H0691:455b-1: rdo rje'i rigs mthong ba yin no //
K12D0746_H0691:455b-5: dngos grub kyi mchog thob par 'gyur te /
K12D0746_H0691:455b-6: ras ma nyams pa la ri mo mkhan gso sbyong
K12D0746_H0691:455b-7: dang ldan pa tshon rtsi spyin med pas sangs rgyas
K12D0746_H0691:455b-8: kyi sku gzugs gser gyi kha dog can chos ston
K12D0746_H0691:455b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i g-yas logs su lha mo gser gyi kha dog can chos nyan pa bri'o //
K12D0746_H0691:455b-11: de'i 'og logs su lag na rdo rje mdog sdo
K12D0746_H0691:455b-12: bsangs la rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa chos nyan
K12D0746_H0691:455b-13: pa bri; de bzhin gshegs pa'i g-yon logs su dbang
K12D0746_H0691:455b-14: phyug chen po 'dam bu mnga' rgyu'i mdog can /
K12D0746_H0691:455b-15: thor tshugs dang cod pan thogs pa bri /
K12D0746_H0691:455b-16: de'i g-yon logs su phur bu gsum pa'i ma ma tang+gi lugs can chos nyan pa'i tshul /
K12D0746_H0691:455b-17: de'i 'og logs su dbang phyug chen po 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i kha dog can /
K12D0746_H0691:455b-18: thor po phur bu gsum pa /
K12D0746_H0691:455b-20: rgyan thams cad kyi mig gsum dang ldan pa bri'o //
K12D0746_H0691:455b-21: de'i drung du ma tang gi rgyal po phur bu gsum pa /
K12D0746_H0691:455b-23: rgyan thams cad kyi brkyan pa ma tang gi cha lugs su bri'o //
K12D0746_H0691:455b-24: de'i logs su 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi kha dog tha dad pa dang /
K12D0746_H0691:455b-25: rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa chos nyan pa'i tshul du bri /
K12D0746_H0691:455b-26: lag na rdo rje'i logs su rdo rje sde dang gtsug nas byung rtse zhing 'dug par bri ste /
K12D0746_H0691:456a-1: sde ni; gser gyi mdog can la rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bya'o //
K12D0746_H0691:456a-2: gtsug nas byung gi mdog dmar la mig gsum yod pa /
K12D0746_H0691:456a-3: glang po che'i pags pa'i smad g-yogs can /
K12D0746_H0691:456a-4: klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi se ral kar thogs la rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa bya'o //
K12D0746_H0691:456a-5: khyad par du rdo rje sde'i drung du rdo rje
K12D0746_H0691:456a-6: khro bo 'bar la log 'dren rnams 'joms shing 'thor
K12D0746_H0691:456a-7: ba bri / rig pa'i mchog 'dod rgur sgyur ba'i
K12D0746_H0691:456a-8: gzugs can lan gcig mthong ba tsam gyis ngo shes
K12D0746_H0691:456a-9: pa tsam du gsol ba lag na rdo rje'i kha
K12D0746_H0691:456a-10: nas byung ba bri'o; ;gzugs de mthong na /
K12D0746_H0691:456a-11: sngon gyi sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur te /
K12D0746_H0691:456a-12: log 'dren rnams kyis kyang mi tshugs so //
K12D0746_H0691:456a-13: gang ri mo'i gzugs 'di sgrub pa des ni /
K12D0746_H0691:456a-14: dngos grub kyi mchog nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0746_H0691:456a-15: sgrub par 'dod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gis zhag gsum
K12D0746_H0691:456a-16: smyung ba byas te zla ba nya la ri mo'i
K12D0746_H0691:456a-17: gzugs mchod pa rgyas par byas na /
K12D0746_H0691:456a-18: gsang sngags snga ma dag gis las rnams bya'o //
K12D0746_H0691:456a-19: 'o mas bkang ba'i snong bzhi dang /
K12D0746_H0691:456a-21: de bzhin du btung ba dang sbyar thug gis bkang
K12D0746_H0691:456a-22: ba bzhi bzhi dbul zhing 'byung po'i gtor ma yang
K12D0746_H0691:456a-23: sbyin no / de nas rig sngags 'chang gis dngos
K12D0746_H0691:456a-24: grub kyi mtshan ma byung gi bar du nam phyed
K12D0746_H0691:456a-25: kyi dus su me tog dri zhim po stong rtsa
K12D0746_H0691:456b-0: brgyad bzlas brjod lan @456b re re sbyar zhing bcom
K12D0746_H0691:456b-1: ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi yum la bsnun na /
K12D0746_H0691:456b-3: me tog gi phreng ba g-yo ba dang /
K12D0746_H0691:456b-4: lha mo las 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K12D0746_H0691:456b-8: rgyas pa'i cho ga 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0746_H0691:456b-9: me tog phreng ba g-yo na ni /
K12D0746_H0691:456b-10: dbab pa'i rig sngags kyi cho ga 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0746_H0691:456b-12: cho ga rgyas pa'i dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur te /
K12D0746_H0691:456b-13: sgrub par gyur na rdo rje'i rigs thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0746_H0691:456b-14: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dpal chen
K12D0746_H0691:456b-15: mo'i rig sngags kyi cho ga rgyas la lhag ma
K12D0746_H0691:456b-17: ci ste dbang phyug chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa
K12D0746_H0691:456b-18: sgrub par 'dod na rig sngags 'chang des me tog
K12D0746_H0691:456b-19: dmar po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod lan re re
K12D0746_H0691:456b-20: dang sbyar te dbang phyug chen po la bsnun na
K12D0746_H0691:456b-21: / de'i yang dngos grub rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te /
K12D0746_H0691:456b-22: dbang phyug chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa yang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0746_H0691:456b-23: ci ste phur bu gsum pa'i cho ga rgyas par
K12D0746_H0691:456b-24: sgrub par 'dod na rig sngags 'chang des ma tog
K12D0746_H0691:456b-25: nag po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod lan re dang
K12D0746_H0691:456b-26: sbyar te phur bu gsum pa'i ri mo la bsnun
K12D0746_H0691:456b-27: na / de yang dngos grub rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te /
K12D0746_H0691:456b-28: phur bu gsum pas byas pa'i ma tang+gi cho ga rgyas pa thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0746_H0691:457a-0: @457a *// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir //
K12D0746_H0691:457a-1: cho ga 'di ni bdag gis bshad //
K12D0746_H0691:457a-2: khyed rnams yid ni dga' bzhin pas //
K12D0746_H0691:457a-3: dngos grub dam pa sbyin par gyis; ;gang sangs rgyas
K12D0746_H0691:457a-4: kyi yum dran pa tsam gyis 'ong bar mi byed
K12D0746_H0691:457a-5: na dngos grub kyang sbyin par mi byed pa ni
K12D0746_H0691:457a-6: / de bzhin gshegs pa la snying rings pa yin te /
K12D0746_H0691:457a-7: ngas kyang rdo rjes spyi bo bkas par bya'o //
K12D0746_H0691:457a-8: gang cho ga rgyas pa 'di 'chang ba de la gdon thams cad dang /
K12D0746_H0691:457a-10: sha za thams cad kyang 'byer zhing skrag par 'gyur ro //
K12D0746_H0691:457a-11: gang zhig cho ga 'dis mchod pa //
K12D0746_H0691:457a-12: de la lha mchog rnams kyis mchod //
K12D0746_H0691:457a-13: gang zhig dngos grub mchod pa la //
K12D0746_H0691:457a-14: de yis cho ga lha mchod bya //
K12D0746_H0691:457a-15: gang zhig cho ga 'di mchod dang //
K12D0746_H0691:457a-16: thams cad rdzogs par mchod byed pa //
K12D0746_H0691:457a-17: de yi lag na rdo rje yis //
K12D0746_H0691:457a-18: bshad pa bzhin du nges par 'grub //
K12D0746_H0691:457a-20: sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs //
K12D0746_H0691:457a-21: lag na rdo rje dpal ldan pa //
K12D0746_H0691:457a-22: de yi lus kyi spyi bor gnas //
K12D0746_H0691:457a-23: yi ge bzhi pa zhes bya ba //
